p: WBE could provide early warnings for community-wide emergence, resurgence ( Kissler et al., 2020), status and trends (sustained transmission or amplification of transmission â€” acceleration or deceleration), suppression, subsidence, and elimination of Covid-19 or any other infectious disease. Deceleration could result from successful control measures or attainment of herd immunity. Should SARS-CoV-2 eventually become endemic ( Galanti and Shaman, 2020), it could be critical to have an ongoing community-wide surveillance system to detect newly emerging clusters.
